glsa.title: procps: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in procps, the worst of which could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: A bunch of small useful utilities that give information about processes using the /proc filesystem.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in procps. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A local attacker could execute arbitrary code, escalate privileges, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All procps users should upgrade to the latest version:
